creator: Shffleu
descriptionHtml:
Download Shuffle, a clothes organizer that also gives you fashion advice from our community or professional stylists. On Shuffle you learn what not to wear or what to wear on a first date, date night outfits, which image is better for your online dating profile, and develop your own personal style. You can also get outfit inspirations & outfit ideas from members or get advice from professional stylist. Compare images that you will use for dating sites and get feedback from our community.

Shuffle is the app you need to build & organize your wardrobe. We are not just another clothes organizer, you can also get tips and fashion advice from professional stylists who are ready to make you look stunning. If you are still not sure what to wear on a first date or what not to wear for date night outfits, how to look sharp on Friday with smart casual outfits for office, how to develop capsule wardrobe or which piece of clothing looks better, join us now!

FEATURES OF SHUFFLE – CLOSET ORGANIZER & FASHION ADVICE FOR SUSTAINABLE FASHION:

• Organize Closet
Upload images of your clothes to Shuffle’s clothes organizer sections. You can see how many items you have for each type of clothes and build your capsule wardrobe strategically.

• Create Outfit with Collage
Combine tops, bottoms, outerwear, shoes, or other clothing items to create an outfit for any occasion. Save outfit for wardrobes for your inspiration when you want to find something to wear as your OOTD/ Outfit of the Day, for first dates, or other occasions.

• Compare two outfits and see which one looks best on you.
Should I buy this dress? What to wear on a first date or what not to wear as date night outfits? Compare which outfit or a piece of clothing is the best for you.

• Compare image to upload to dating sites.
Compare two images and get input of which image makes you look better to upload to a dating site. You can get advice only from men, women, or everyone and you can prefer to give advice to men, women, or everyone too!

• Advice from Professional Stylists
Not sure how to build your personal style or which look is the best for you? Ask advice from our pro stylists who are ready to help you look good on any occasion!

• Read articles.
Get outfit ideas for women and men to inspire you. You can read articles about developing your personal style, learn about smart casual outfit for women or men, and many more.

• Upload Photos
Aside from getting outfit ideas from members, you can also upload your photos and share outfit inspiration to other members. Build your own personal style and fashion lookbook. Upload your photo wearing your outfit of the days.

How to use Shuffle:

1. Login to our app using Google, Facebook, or phone number.
View outfit of the days, fashion lookbook shots, or outfits inspirations from our members.
2. Comment on member’s images.
3. Take pictures of your clothes with your phone camera.
4. Add sections (i.e skirts, pants, blouses, suits, etc)
5. Organize closet by categorizing your clothes to different sections.
6. You can compare two images and ask for feedback from people of which image is the best
7. Ask for some advice from professional stylist about fashion & the best fashion items and style for you.

On the Settings section, you can ask if you want advice from Man, Woman, or Everyone, and whether you want to give fashion advice to man or about outfit for woman. You can choose the location of the stylist who will give you advice. This is important because fashion trends will be different from one place to another.

So, if you need a clothes organizer and advice about fashion from the fashion community or pro stylists, download and join Shuffle now!
---
We hope our app can give outfit inspirations and give you ideas about what to wear or what not to wear, helping you to build your personal style or capsule wardrobe, and other benefits.

descriptionShort: Organize closets, develop your personal style & get advice from pro stylist
title: Shuffle – Closet Organizer, Style & Fashion Advice

creator: Shffleu
descriptionHtml:
Why Shuffle?
1) 20% of clothing that we buy isn’t even worn once
2) 4 times is the average wear of each garments
3) 60% of all clothing garments end up in a landfill or incinerator within a year of being purchased
4) 10% of the carbon emission comes from just the fashion industry.
5) You’re not sure what to wear on an occasion
6) You want to develop your unique and sustainable style

Shuffle Fashion app will help you in 6 unique ways:
1) Organize closet & track each item by how often you use them
2) Create outfits of the day (ootd) from your wardrobe. Shop from your wardrobe
3) Compare your outfits and get opinion from fashionistas and professional stylists /image consultants
4) Get feedback before you buy. No more impulse purchases
5) Featured articles and social posts for sustainability tips and ideas
6) Plant real trees by just giving fashion advice to others

The application is created for your journey towards slow fashion while still looking perfect with your own ideas and the style tips from the wardrobe/image consultants.


FEATURES OF SHUFFLE – CLOSET ORGANIZER & FASHION ADVICE FOR SUSTAINABLE & ETHICAL FASHION:

• Organize Closet
Upload images of your clothes to Shuffle’s wardrobe organizer sections. You can see how many items you have for each type of clothes and build your minimalist capsule wardrobe strategically. You can also create categories for summer style, spring style or winter style.

• Create Outfit with Collage
Combine tops, bottoms, outerwear, shoes, or other clothing items to create an outfit for any occasion. Save outfit for wardrobes for your inspiration when you want to find something to wear as your Outfit of the Day (OOTD), for first dates, or other occasions.

• Compare two outfits and see which one looks best on you.
Should I buy this dress? What to wear on a first date or what not to wear as date night outfits? Compare which outfit or a piece of clothing is the best for you.

• Compare images.
Compare two images and get input of which image makes you look better to upload to a social site. You can get advice only from men, women, or everyone and you can prefer to give advice to men, women, or everyone too!

• Advice from Professional Stylists
Not sure how to build your personal style or which look /ootd is the best for you? Ask advice from our pro wardrobe & image consultants who are ready to help you look good on any occasion! You can also ask what to wear just from the stylists without sharing it with others

• Inspiration
How should I start my minimalist or sustainable wardrobe? What is ethical and sustainable fashion? What to wear or what brands and materials are sustainable? Or Do you need to use a style guide? You can find them all from on our inspiration page from the featured articles from ethical fashion blogs

• Plant trees
Get points from each time you give fashion advice to Shuffle app users. The points can be converted to a real tree that we will plant to offset carbon emission from the garments industry and create a sustainable future


On the Settings section, you can ask if you want advice from Man, Woman, or Everyone, and whether you want to give fashion advice to man or about outfit for woman. You can choose the location of the fashionistas/wardrobe consultants who will give you advice. This is important because fashion trends will be different from one place to another.

So, if you need a closet organizer and advice about fashion from the image consultants and professional stylists, download and join Shuffle now!

We hope our app can help your sustainable fashion journey and give you ideas about what to wear or what not to wear, helping you to build your personal style or minimalist wardrobe, and other benefits. Please be a part of our journey by sending us your valuable feedback and keep eye on our upcoming features!

descriptionShort: Organize closets, get advice from image consultants & start sustainable fashion
title: Shuffle–Closet Organizer, Wardrobe & Style Advice

creator: Shffleu
descriptionHtml:
Why Shuffle?
1) 20% of clothing that we buy isn’t even worn once
2) 4 times is the average wear of each garments
3) 60% of all clothing garments end up in a landfill or incinerator within a year of being purchased
4) 10% of the carbon emission comes from just the fashion industry.
5) You’re not sure what to wear on an occasion
6) You want to develop your unique and sustainable style

Shuffle Fashion app will help you in 6 unique ways:
1) Organize closet & track each item by how often you use them
2) Create outfits of the day (ootd) from your wardrobe. Shop from your wardrobe
3) Compare your outfits and get opinion from fashionistas and professional stylists /image consultants
4) Get feedback before you buy. No more impulse purchases
5) Featured articles and social posts for sustainability tips and ideas
6) Plant real trees by just giving fashion advice to others

The application is created for your journey towards slow fashion while still looking perfect with your own ideas and the style tips from the wardrobe/image consultants.


FEATURES OF SHUFFLE – CLOSET ORGANIZER & FASHION ADVICE FOR SUSTAINABLE & ETHICAL FASHION:

• Organize Closet
Upload images of your clothes to Shuffle’s wardrobe organizer sections. You can see how many items you have for each type of clothes and build your minimalist capsule wardrobe strategically. You can also create categories for summer style, spring style or winter style.

• Create Outfit with Collage
Combine tops, bottoms, outerwear, shoes, or other clothing items to create an outfit for any occasion. Save outfit for wardrobes for your inspiration when you want to find something to wear as your Outfit of the Day (OOTD), for first dates, or other occasions.

• Compare two outfits and see which one looks best on you.
Should I buy this dress? What to wear on a first date or what not to wear as date night outfits? Compare which outfit or a piece of clothing is the best for you.

• Compare images.
Compare two images and get input of which image makes you look better to upload to a social site. You can get advice only from men, women, or everyone and you can prefer to give advice to men, women, or everyone too!

• Advice from Professional Stylists
Not sure how to build your personal style or which look /ootd is the best for you? Ask advice from our pro wardrobe & image consultants who are ready to help you look good on any occasion! You can also ask what to wear just from the stylists without sharing it with others

• Inspiration
How should I start my minimalist or sustainable wardrobe? What is ethical and sustainable fashion? What to wear or what brands and materials are sustainable? Or Do you need to use a style guide? You can find them all from on our inspiration page from the featured articles from ethical fashion blogs

• Plant trees
Get points from each time you give fashion advice to Shuffle app users. The points can be converted to a real tree that we will plant to offset carbon emission from the garments industry and create a sustainable future


On the Settings section, you can ask if you want advice from Man, Woman, or Everyone, and whether you want to give fashion advice to man or about outfit for woman. You can choose the location of the fashionistas/wardrobe consultants who will give you advice. This is important because fashion trends will be different from one place to another.

So, if you need a closet organizer and advice about fashion from the image consultants and professional stylists, download and join Shuffle now!

We hope our app can help your sustainable fashion journey and give you ideas about what to wear or what not to wear, helping you to build your personal style or minimalist wardrobe, and other benefits. Please be a part of our journey by sending us your valuable feedback and keep eye on our upcoming features!

Get points from each time you give fashion advice to Shuffle app users. The points can be converted to a real tree that we will plant to offset carbon emission from the garments industry and create a sustainable future


On the Settings section, you can ask if you want advice from Man, Woman, or Everyone, and whether you want to give fashion advice to man or about outfit for woman. You can choose the location of the fashionistas/wardrobe consultants who will give you advice. This is important because fashion trends will be different from one place to another.

So, if you need a closet organizer and advice about fashion from the image consultants and professional stylists, download and join Shuffle now!

We hope our app can help your sustainable fashion journey and give you ideas about what to wear or what not to wear, helping you to build your personal style or minimalist wardrobe, and other benefits. Please be a part of our journey by sending us your valuable feedback and keep eye on our upcoming features!
